h1. Available preferences

|| *Preference* || *Type*|| *Default Value* || *Description* ||
| *repository* | {{String}} | {{repository}} | The current repository name. It is always "repository" |

h1. Example

{code:xml}
<portlet-preferences>
  <preference>
    <name>repository</name>
    <value>repository</value>
    <read-only>false</read-only>
  </preference>
</portlet-preferences>    
{code}
